name: Gig Life
description:
After literally living under a rock for years, you emerge hungry and thirsty. You'll have to take on low-paying "gigs" in order to survive.

Cut grass, make deliveries, break rocks, and more to earn enough cash to keep from starving.

Complete all gigs and learn the secrets of the wise man who has years of gig work experience.

Gig Life is a short experience inspired by the early days of computer gaming complete with simplistic sprites, three classic colors (white, green, and amber), and CRT scanlines.
It's also the first game in the Small Style Series - a line of non-connected and often experimental budget titles for PC.
